name: Octorabbit
description:
Octorabbit is saving the universe!

Control its tentacles to repair the ship, but be careful with the space garbage that also sticks to them!
Click and hold to grab the ship parts and bring them back to their place, and shake your tentacles to throw away the space junk.

Game developed in the Global Game Jam 2020.

CONTROLS
A, S, D, F: Switch tentacle
Click and drag: Move ship parts
Shake the mouse: Throw away space junk

TEAM
Diego Iáñez Ávila: programmer
Silvia Navarro Ruiz: 2D artist
Yaiza Ahsen Deserio: 2D artist
Alejandro de la Plata Ramos: programmer
Guillermo Bueno Vargas: programmer, UI artist
Sergio Linares Peralta: programmer
Loló Maldonado Leza y Rodriguez: music, sound FX
Manuel Herrera Ojea: music

AWARDS
Best Graphics (Global Game Jam 2020 - Granada, Spain)
